blog_title: 宝塔安装 PHP 报错 : libcares.so.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
content:
系统环境 腾讯云 debian 10 64位，宝塔 免费版 7.8.0

直接说解决办法：安装 apt install libc-ares2 ，然后再去宝塔安装就OK了。

下面是解决问题时的过程

报错信息是这样的：

/www/server/php/70/sbin/php-fpm: error while loading shared libraries: libcares.so.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

当然，如果PHP版本不同也有可能是下面这些：

/www/server/php/52/sbin/php-fpm: error while loading shared libraries: libcares.so.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
/www/server/php/53/sbin/php-fpm: error while loading shared libraries: libcares.so.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
/www/server/php/54/sbin/php-fpm: error while loading shared libraries: libcares.so.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
/www/server/php/55/sbin/php-fpm: error while loading shared libraries: libcares.so.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
/www/server/php/56/sbin/php-fpm: error while loading shared libraries: libcares.so.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
/www/server/php/70/sbin/php-fpm: error while loading shared libraries: libcares.so.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
/www/server/php/71/sbin/php-fpm: error while loading shared libraries: libcares.so.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
/www/server/php/72/sbin/php-fpm: error while loading shared libraries: libcares.so.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
/www/server/php/73/sbin/php-fpm: error while loading shared libraries: libcares.so.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
/www/server/php/74/sbin/php-fpm: error while loading shared libraries: libcares.so.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
/www/server/php/80/sbin/php-fpm: error while loading shared libraries: libcares.so.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
/www/server/php/81/sbin/php-fpm: error while loading shared libraries: libcares.so.2: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

其实主要就是要把这个 libcares.so.2 想办法安装上，我用的腾讯云 debian10。直接执行：

apt install libcares2

肯定是找不到的：

Reading package lists... Done
Building dependency tree
Reading state information... Done
E: Unable to locate package curl-loader

百度了很久，终于知道要安装 libc-ares2，于是执行

apt install libc-ares2

然后再去宝塔安装PHP就可以了，如果你还是安装不上的话，换成下面这个源再试试：

deb http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/debian/ buster main
deb-src http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/debian/ buster main

deb http://security.debian.org/debian-security buster/updates main
deb-src http://security.debian.org/debian-security buster/updates main

# buster-updates, previously known as 'volatile'
deb http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/debian/ buster-updates main
deb-src http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/debian/ buster-updates main

deb http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/debian/ buster-backports main non-free contrib
deb-src http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/debian/ buster-backports main non-free contrib

deb http://mirrors.aliyun.com/debian/ stretch main non-free contrib
deb-src http://mirrors.aliyun.com/debian/ stretch main non-free contrib
deb http://mirrors.aliyun.com/debian-security stretch/updates main
deb-src http://mirrors.aliyun.com/debian-security stretch/updates main
deb http://mirrors.aliyun.com/debian/ stretch-updates main non-free contrib
deb-src http://mirrors.aliyun.com/debian/ stretch-updates main non-free contrib
deb http://mirrors.aliyun.com/debian/ stretch-backports main non-free contrib
deb-src http://mirrors.aliyun.com/debian/ stretch-backports main non-free contrib

非常感谢你能看到这里，其实我也是菜鸟，如果这个问题你还没有解决的话，请留言。我们一起来研究研究。
